events.name: Lithium Nickel Manganese Cobalt Oxides (NMC) optimization for electric vehicle applications
events.wd_label: Lithium Nickel Manganese Cobalt Oxides (NMC) optimization for electric vehicle applications
events.wd_description: Reducing cobalt content and increasing nickel content in NMC to improve energy density and operating voltage.
events.description: Reducing cobalt content and increasing nickel content in NMC to improve energy density and operating voltage.

events.name: Reducing Cobalt Content
events.wd_description: Due to ethical issues with cobalt mining and high cost, reducing the amount of cobalt in NMC.
events.description: Due to ethical issues with cobalt mining and high cost, reducing the amount of cobalt in NMC.

events.name: Increasing Nickel Content
events.wd_description: Provides more capacity within the stable operation window.
events.description: Provides more capacity within the stable operation window.

events.name: NMC Battery Usage in Electric Vehicles
events.wd_label: NMC Battery Usage in Electric Vehicles
events.wd_description: Many electric cars use NMC cathode batteries, installed in BMW ActiveE and BMW i8.
events.description: Many electric cars use NMC cathode batteries, installed in BMW ActiveE and BMW i8.

events.name: NMC Batteries
events.wd_description: Used as cathode batteries in electric vehicles.
events.description: Used as cathode batteries in electric vehicles.

events.name: Usage in Electric Vehicles
events.wd_description: Many electric cars use NMC cathode batteries. Examples include the BMW ActiveE and BMW i8. Tesla, however, uses nickel cobalt aluminum oxide and lithium iron phosphate batteries for their vehicles. Tesla's home storage product, the Powerwall, uses NMC to increase the number of charge/discharge cycles over its lifetime.
events.description: Many electric cars use NMC cathode batteries. Examples include the BMW ActiveE and BMW i8. Tesla, however, uses nickel cobalt aluminum oxide and lithium iron phosphate batteries for their vehicles. Tesla's home storage product, the Powerwall, uses NMC to increase the number of charge/discharge cycles over its lifetime.

events.name: BMW ActiveE
events.wd_description: The BMW ActiveE, launched in 2011, uses NMC cathode batteries.
events.description: The BMW ActiveE, launched in 2011, uses NMC cathode batteries.

events.name: BMW i8
events.wd_description: The BMW i8, starting from 2013, also uses NMC cathode batteries.
events.description: The BMW i8, starting from 2013, also uses NMC cathode batteries.

events.name: Tesla Powerwall
events.wd_description: The Tesla Powerwall, a home storage unit, uses NMC batteries to increase the number of charge/discharge cycles over its lifespan.
events.description: The Tesla Powerwall, a home storage unit, uses NMC batteries to increase the number of charge/discharge cycles over its lifespan.

events.name: BMW i8
events.wd_description: The BMW i8, starting from 2013, also uses NMC cathode batteries.
